profileText: a Representative from North Carolina; born in Kings Mountain, Cleveland County, N.C., October 2, 1970; graduated from Kings Mountain High School, Kings Mountain, N.C., 1988; attended Campbell University, Buies Creek, N.C.; B.A., University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, N.C., 1992; J.D., Oklahoma City University School of Law, Oklahoma City, Okla., 1995; lawyer, private practice; member of the North Carolina state house of representatives, 2003-2024, speaker, 2015-2024; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
